**Tender Annoucement: Green Roof Maintenance Services**
================================

**Reference:** WS3713621586-Doc3734038491
**Date Published:** 2022-11-08
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-19T14:00:00 (previously amended closing time)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit their proposals for the Green Roof Maintenance services for various government buildings in Ottawa, Ontario. The services required include labor, materials, equipment, supervision, and transportation.

**Key Requirements:**

* Proposed services must be completed by March 30, 2024
* Arrangements have been made for a site visit on November 29, 2022 (bidder must confirm attendance by November 21, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EST)
* Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by December 19, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EST; late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

**Additional Information:**

* The Green Roof Maintenance services will be provided for the following buildings:
	+ Sir John A. MacDonald (SJAM) Building (144 Wellington Street)
	+ Wellington Building (180 Wellington Street)
	+ 2 Rideau Street
* The bidder must have experience delivering environmental roof services in complex institutional settings.
* Trade Agreements: The services are subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable trade agreements.

**Selection Criteria:**

The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price. All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14527599?extsite=MTQ1Mjc1OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Contact Information:**

For more information or to confirm attendance at the site visit, please contact Caroline Richard of the Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPAC) at [caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
